title: Retro Browser Game
description: 'Tomodachi' is a fun and simple browser game where players can cultivate a newborn planet and achieve a variety of clever endgames. Built from scratch in an agile environment with 3 other developers.

title: E-commerce Application
description: An e-commerce site built with React that manages global state with Redux, providing a traditional and seamless cart/checkout feature.

title: Password Management Application
description: Pass-stache is a powerful password storage tool, built with a team of 4 other developers.

title: Blog/Social Application
description: Solo built, full stack site where users can view and create blog posts and interact via the comments.

title: Live Weather Dashboard
description: A one-page site built with jQuery and Bootstrap that uses the OpenWeather API to retrieve forecast data in specific cities. Local storage saves a search history.

title: Health/Fitness Plan Application
description: Git N Shape is a health and fitness jump starter app that generates tailored workout and nutrition plans for users. Built with a team of 3 other developers.

title: Automatic Website Generator
description: Quickly generate a website displaying your team of employees through a command line app built with Node.js. Created with a focus on object oriented programming and test driven development.

title: Coding Quiz Application
description: Test your knowledgee with a timed JavaScript quiz. Wrong answers dock your time and decrease your score.

title: README Generator
description: A Node.js command line app that gathers prompted information from the user to dynamically generate a professional README document, letting developers focus more on their code.
